mapper.sql: id, dict_id, dic_name, dic_value, dic_id, create_time, create_by, update_by, update_time, yn
mapper.update:
update admin_dictionary
dict_id = #{dictId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
dic_name = #{dicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dic_value = #{dicValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dic_id = #{dicId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
yn = #{yn,jdbcType=TINYINT}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select count(*) from admin_dictionary where yn =1
